item.description: The BOSTON MARKETING LEARNING GROUP (BMLG) is a NON-PROFIT organization for business people and marketing professionals to help learn the many different aspects of marketing. The Boston Marketing Learning Group (BMLG) will provide FREE MARKETING WORKSHOPS on a monthly/bi-monthly basis. The ONLINE MARKETING topics that will be covered include: Search Engine Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Email Marketing, Pay Per Click Advertising, Blogging, Social Networking, Social Media Marketing & More! The OFFLINE MARKETING topics that may be covered include: Direct Mail, Direct Response Marketing, Printing, Radio Advertising, TV Advertising, Print Media, Newspaper Advertising & More! PLEASE VIEW THE UPCOMING MEETINGS BELOW and SIGN UP TO JOIN FOR FREE!
item.name: Boston Marketing Learning Group
